sourcesContent:
const AssignTaskPopup = ({ onClose }) => { const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const studentID = e.target.studentID.value; const task_field = e.target.task_field.value; const quantity = e.target.quantity.value; const assign_Component = e.target.assign_Component.value; const assign_deadline = e.target.assign_deadline.value; const student_id = localStorage.getItem('student_id'); const TASK = { studentID,task_field, assign_Component ,quantity, assign_deadline, student_id } fetch("http://localhost:5498/assign-task",{ method: "POST", // or 'PUT' headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(TASK), }) .then(result => { console.log(result); if(result.status==200) { console.log("Data Inserted Succesfully") } else { console.log("Error Occured", result); } }) } return (
); }; export default AssignTaskPopup;
